source.d9ab0676: 2) I added CO2 data to consider the correlation between the U.S. wildfires total cost and world CO2
source.8bb7e92e: # Objective: I tired to find how global CO2 and climate change have impact to the wildfire cost in the U.S. by adding global CO2 data into data set.
source.35bd2acc: # Global CO2 causes climate change. And climate change causes wildfires and huge cost !
source.841599eb: I got CO2 data from worldbank https://data.worldbank.org/topic/19
source.aea5f3c8:
* The correlation between the U.S. wildfires total cost and world CO2 is very strong positive '0.8'.
* The correlation between the U.S. wildfires total cost and the ratio of the U.S. CO2 to world CO2 is very strong negative '-0.7'.
source.1dbeb5f6: Can we predict total cost by two features, Acres where we have wildfires in the U.S. , and the U.S. CO2 / global CO2 which is influenced by two factors, one is total CO2 we make and the other is the CO2 contribution of the U.S. to global ?
